name: actual-budget
description: Actual is a privacy-focused personal budgeting and finance manager with offline-first architecture. It allows local data control, multi-device sync, budgeting categories, transaction tracking, and report generation. Designed to be self-hosted.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Complete control over your financial data with local-first architecture. Your money, your business

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Full functionality without internet connection, data stays on your device. Budget anywhere, anytime

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Seamlessly access your budget across all devices. Stay updated wherever you are

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Automatic transaction imports from connected accounts. Save time on manual entry

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Native desktop apps for Linux, Windows, and macOS. Optimal performance everywhere

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete ownership and control of your financial information. No third-party access
